data.text: @aslihantuna Hello Aslihan, how can we help you through this channel? Thank you.
@justin_wilman Hi Justin, please accept our apologies for any distress caused. Can we help you through this channel? Please inform us through DM. Thank you

@fenner_michael Hi! We are sorry but we cannot precise a timeframe. Once the analysis is completed, you will be contacted by email. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance
Quedamos a su entera disposición para cualquier duda o aclaración adicional. Gracias

Hola! Lamentamos la situación reportada. Le informamos que la reclamación presentada aún sigue en análisis. Una vez completado el análisis, se le contactará por correo electrónico, por lo que le pedimos que espere por favor.
@rusyasurkova Hi! We inform that you will need to await our feedback via email. Your complaints are still under review. Thank you in advance

@rusyasurkova Hi! Although we understand your urgency, we inform you that your complaints are still under review. Once the analysis is completed, you will be contacted by email. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you
@biancaallane Hola! Pedimos disculpas por cualquier inconveniente causado y haremos todo lo posible para encontrar su equipaje con la mayor brevedad. Gracias
@biancaallane Quedamos a su entera disposición para cualquier duda o aclaración adicional. Gracias.

@biancaallane Hola! Lamentamos todos los inconvenientes causados por la pérdida de su equipaje. La búsqueda de su equipaje continúa. En ausencia del mismo, podrá comprar bienes de primera necesidad. En cuanto haya novedades, será informada, por lo que le pedimos que espere por favor.

@AlisonDinning78 Hello Alison,
We answered per DM.

@Ardegu677 Hello,
We answered per DM.

@daftmama For confidential reasons, we suggest you to send this information through DM.
Thank you. (2/2)
@mathieum90 Hello mathieu90, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
Time to BeReal (Airplane edition)! ✈️ https://t.co/UH3a4osiV0

data.text: @RafaBelattini Olá Rafael, lamentamos imenso a situação e todos os constrangimentos causados. Caso possamos prestar assistência, não hesite em contactar. Obrigado.

@AmaAdom14169587 Hello Ama,
We answered per DM.

@Alberto95612463 Hello Alberto,
We kindly request you to provide us your email address, the booking reference and the claims file number.
For confidential reasons, we suggest you to send this information through DM.
Thank you.
@lynnziemm Hello Lynnzie, we apologise for the distress caused by this situation. We are verifying the situation. Thank you.

@ChasingProdigy Hello Chasing Prodigy, to verify the situation, we kindly request you to clarify the change you wish to make and to provide us with your booking reference or the electronic ticket number. For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.

data.text:
@mirkok1973 Olá demonio,
Pedimos imensa desculpa pela demora na resposta, facto devido ao elevado número de mensagens recebidas. 
Para que seja possível verificar, pedimos que nos clarifique a sua questão.
Obrigada.

@ranymonteir Olá,
Respondemos por DM.
@StefaniBertrand @laurabasset4 @dgccrf @DGAC @CPVA Bonjour BertrandStefani, nous avons répondu à votre message privé. Merci.
@malebrun Olá Mariê, podemos ajudar por esta via? Obrigada.
@LolsJupiter Hello LolaC, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@Gaz8374 Gaz, it is only possible to give accommodation directly at the airport, so we're sorry but we can't help you through this channel regarding that situation. Thank you

@kristelia Hello Kristelia,
We have checked about your question and inform you that your claim is still under analysis. As soon as possible you will be contacted. Thank you
@euecfilho Olá Quentin, como podemos ajudar? Pedimos por favor os dados por DM. Obrigado
@bameroo Hi Bameroo, we kindly ask you to clean the cookies and try again. If you receive the same error, please send us a print screen through DM. Thank you
@Gaz8374 Hi Gaz, please accept our apologies for any distress caused. Can we help you through this channel? Thank you

@everysteph Hello Stefania,

can you inform us through DM your booking reference or electronic ticket number (047...) such as the seat you wish to assign so we may verify? Thank you.

@jader_lc Olá Jader,
Informamos que respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada

@CoDoJo1 Hello Corina, 
We inform that we have already answered your private messages sent a few hours ago. Thank you for understanding.

@crentemetal Hello Moisés,
We have already answered your private messages. Thank you
@Harricat1 Hi Skm, the refund is in analysis and it will be processed as briefly as possible. Thank you
@Aleks_with_KS Hi Aleksandra, can we help you through this channel? Please inform us through DM. Thank you

@ShinabargerJake Hello Jake,
We have replied to your private messages. Thank you

@swamp3r Hello Swampah,
In order for us to be able to check about your question, we kindly request that you provide us with the booking reference. For security reasons and data protection, we advise you to send the details through a private message. Thank you

data.text: @grosadilla @iamLL_trading Hi Gonzalo, we've replied through DM. Thank you
@icacind Olá Ingrid, qual o número de processo de mala perdida que abriu no aeroporto por favor? Sugerimos os dados por DM. Obrigado

urls.title: Formulario de contacto: envíe solicitudes, sugerencias o reclamaciones | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Hable con TAP, rellene el formulario de contacto y comparta su opinión sobre nuestro servicio. Envíenos peticiones de información, halagos, sugerencias o reclamaciones.

data.text:
@LaradGamer Larad, con respecto a los gastos extra, le informamos que puede explicar la situación rellenando el formulario designado en nuestra pagina  web:

https://t.co/W4DHXNF3R4

Quedamos a su disposición.
Gracias.
@FDeliro We will reply as soon as possible. Thank you.

@DMConstantino Olá Diogo,

se recebeu um aviso de atraso de novo via SMS, a hora informarda é o sempre o horário local do ponto de partida. Obrigado.
@provence2704 Hello Nana, in order to verify, we kindly ask you to contact us by private message with your complaint number and assocated booking reference. Thank you.

@Bluesmind Olá Paulo, como podemos ajudar? Por razões de segurança, solicitamos que nos envie a sua questão e nos indique o código da sua reserva ou o número do bilhete eletrónico por mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@LaradGamer Hola Larad, pedimos disculpas por la situación reportada 
Intentamos avisar a nuestros pasajeros con la mayor antelación posible en caso de irregularidades operativas, que tratamos de evitar hasta el último momento. (1/2)

@TheresaBrandon5 Hello Theresa, we have verified that your purchase was paid by partially using a voucher, thus it can only be refunded as a travel voucher again, the amount paid via card was already refunded on April 2022.
If further assistance is needed, please let us know. Thank you.

@windfurybot @TAP_Portugal Hello Windfurybot, we apologize for the situation. In order to verify the situation, we kindly request you to provide us with your booking reference or the electronic ticket number. For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.

urls.title: Información de vuelo | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Consulte las salidas y llegadas de los vuelos TAP. Busque por número de vuelo, aeropuerto o destino y acceda a toda la información disponible sobre el viaje.

data.text:
@xararmin Esto también se puede verificar a través del siguiente enlace:

https://t.co/TmX3l6DU20

Quedamos a su entera disposición para cualquier duda o aclaración adicional.
Gracias. (2/2)

@xararmin Hola XaraArmin, pedimos disculpas por las molestias ocasionadas.
Le informamos que la hora estimada de llegada es 12:50. (1/2)

@GiuseppePeltron Hello Giuseppe, we apologize for the late delivery of your luggage. We assure you that the situation is being verified and that you will be contacted as soon as there is more information. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you.

@bethany_cammack Hello Bethany,
we are verifying the situation. You will be contacted as soon as possible. Thank you.
@Lilais23 Hello Irais, we apologize for the delay and inform you that we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

@Stellapippis Hello Stella, we regret the described situation and inconvenience caused.
In order to verify, please send us the booking reference or e-ticket number by private message. Thank you.

@Prkr_harry Hello Harry,
we are verifying the situation. Therefore, you will be contacted via email as soon as possible. Thank you.

@Bueckersche Hello Heike,
we are verifying the situation and you will be contacted via email as soon as possible. Thank you.

@yperse Hello Hedie, we apologize for the late resolution of your refund. We assure you that the refund of the missing amount is being processed and that it will be completed as soon as possible. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you.

@LolsJupiter Hello LolaC,
how can we help you through this channel? Please provide us the booking reference via DM. Thank you.

urls.title: Reclamação – Como podemos ajudar? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Queremos que tenha a melhor experiência TAP. Indique-nos a situação para que a possamos solucionar ou consulte o estado de uma reclamação já efetuada.

data.text: @renato_natal Olá Renato, lamentamos imenso a situação e todos os constrangimentos causados. De forma a verificar o estado do seu processo, pedimos que nos indique, por mensagem privada, o número do Relatório de Irregularidade de Bagagem (PIR). Obrigado.

@MarisaChisena @TAP_AIRLINE @tapairisgarbage Hello Marisa,

can you inform us your lost luggage file number (PIR), bag tag and booking reference related so we may verify? Thank you.

@LolsJupiter Hello LolaC,

We sincerely apologize for the situation mentioned and the inconvenience caused. TAP Air Portugal works everyday in order to promote our passenger satisfaction and to improve our services. In case you require our assistance, please let us know. Thank you.

@eigree Lo antes posible le contactaremos través de su correo electrónico. 
Para cualquier cuestión adicional estamos a su disposición. Gracias  (2/2)
@eigree Su caso esta en proceso de analice, Eigree. Debido a la gran cantidad de solicitudes recibidas en los últimos meses, todos los procedimientos de reembolso se retrasan considerablemente. (1/2)
@martonolympio Olá Marton, qual o código de reserva ou número de bilhete eletrónico? Sugerimos os dados por mensagem privada por razões de confidencialidade. Obrigado.

urls.title: Map of destinations – Find your trip | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: You are ever closer to your trip. Choose how much you want to spend, and when and where you want to go. Be inspired by the best destinations!

data.text:
@LuucyCope Hello,  
You can find it through the following link:

✈️ https://t.co/HUvwj4UwDr

If you need any further assistance, please let us know. Thank you.

@eigree Lo antes posible le vamos a contactar por correo electrónico. 
Para cualquier cuestión adicional estamos a su disposición. Gracias de antemano por su paciencia. (2/2)

@eigree Hola, 
Comprendemos que desea ver su situación finalizada. Todavía, debido a la gran cantidad de solicitudes recibidas en los últimos meses, todos los procedimientos se retrasan considerablemente. (1/2)

@CarlaOl84163669 Olá Carla, a sua reclamação encontra-se em análise, pelo que será finalizada com a maior brevidade possível. Caso exista mais alguma questão em que possamos ajudar, não hesite em contactar-nos. Obrigada.

@HarshilRulez Hello Danger-Zone,

yes it is 😉 Up to 2 kg.

@LukeSt_K @manairport @tapportugalair @MENnewsdesk Hello Luke,
We kindly request you to provide us your email address, the booking reference and the claims file number.
For confidential reasons, we suggest you to send this information through DM.
Thank you.
@DaveAmante11 @daveamante11 Dave, we replied to your direct message. Thank you.
@reevesyk1 Hi Kevin, your DM was not ignored, as we informed you your complaint will be replied to by email as briefly as possible. Thank you

@DaveAmante11 @daveamante11 Hello, we kindly ask you to provide us with your refund identification numbers (ROR) in order to verify. For security reasons we suggest that you do it by direct message.
Thank you.

@elsa_carreno Elsa,
as requested via DM, please provide us the booking reference or ticket number in order to verify the situation. Thank you.

@emiliohr @emiliohr Hola, lamentamos cualquier molestia ocasionada. Si podemos ayudar con alguna cuestión, por favor, póngase en contacto a través de mensaje directo. 
Gracias.

Mais uma vitória nos World Travel Awards 2022, os mais prestigiados prémios na área do turismo. A TAP venceu em 2 das categorias:
🥇 Companhia Aérea Líder Mundial nas ligações a África;
🥇 Companhia Aérea Líder Mundial nas ligações à América do Sul.
Obrigado a todos os eleitores! https://t.co/oeUC6QmJ45

data.text:
We are proud to announce another victory in the World Travel Awards 2022, the most prestigious awards in the field of tourism. TAP won in 2 of the categories:
🥇 World's Leading Airline to Africa;
🥇 World's Leading Airline to South America.

A huge thank you to all the voters! https://t.co/7F8Kfb6e6t
